name: Mike The Guitar 128k
description:
Help Mike to fulfil his dream: to play a solo! Mike wants to play Nirvanas 'Smells like teen spirit'. But bad ass Beethoven and his gang (Chopin and Mozart) want to stop our brave guitar hero. Avoid angry instruments and the maestros. Collect the 8 plectrums to practice: Piece of cake? Maybe, but at first the plectrums are blocked. Take one and another one will be freed. Which one? Find out! Eat the batteries to add energy, so even if one of the bad asses get you. Mike can start from the first screen again. After you have collected all plectrums go the loudspeaker, connect and  "Play it again, Mike"!


Created 2018

Game by Sebastian Braunert&Uwe Geiken 
Loading Screen by Andy Green  
Music by LaesQ & rnR T.A.D.7D9
Fonts: Damian Guard
